content: oma s curler hat crochet pattern by sara sach please add this to your ravelry favorites ***free pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2017/10/omas-curlers-hat-crochet-pattern-posh html ***video link *** https //youtu be/h_by-cotnew we added a video to the blog to help you skill easy materials crochet hook k / 6 50 mm yarn- red heart super saver 4 3 5 oz grey heather yarn needle 15 - 20 foam culers stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet size approximate size adult 20 - 22 inches please do not copy or redistribute this pattern
